#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main (){
int cases = 0;
int op[100000];
cin >> cases;

for (int i = 0;i<cases;i++){
        char ch[100000] ;
        cin>>ch;
        char* p;
        p = ch;
        int temp = 0;
        int ctr =0;
          while(*p != '\0'){
            temp += int(*p);
            p++;
            ctr++;
        }
        op[i]=(temp/ctr);
}
for (int i = 0;i<cases;i++){
cout<<char(op[i])<<endl;
}
return 0;

}
